items.name: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.
items.notes: Absolutely brilliant film. The storytelling and performances are exceptional. A true classic that never gets old.

items.name: Parasite
items.description: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.
items.notes: Thought-provoking and brilliantly crafted. The social commentary is powerful and the twist is unexpected. Deserved the Oscar win.

items.name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.
